[Learn Magic]

Congratulations! You've finally reached level 7.
You are now eligible to learn new magic as well as further enhance existing magic. To do so, seek out the Magister in the village. You can find the Magister by following the direction indicated by the arrow above your head.
Learning a skill requires a certain number of Skill Points (SP). SP is gradually accumulated through hunting monsters. If you don't have enough SP to learn a skill, acquire more by spending time hunting!
To see how many SP you currently have, open the Character Info Screen by clicking on the face icon at the bottom right of your screen (you can also press ALT+T).
